message.entry: Solver encountered an error while simulating model ''{0}'' at time {1} and cannot continue. Please check the model for errors.
Solver is encountering difficulty in simulating model ''{0}'' at time {1}. Simulink will continue to simulate with warnings. Please check the model for errors.

Continuous state ''{0}'' of ''{1}'' at time {2} is not finite. Simulink will terminate the simulation. There may be a singularity in the solution. Check the model ''{3}'' for errors. Try reducing the fixed step size or tighten the error tolerances for variable-step solvers.

It is invalid to merge the non-continuous signal from block ''{0}'' output port {1,number,integer} with other continuous signals because the merged signal is driving an input port used to compute the derivative of a continuous state.
